title: Texas Puts Execution Of Mentally Ill Man On Hold
teaser: A federal appeals court stayed the execution of Scott Panetti in Texas on Wednesday. He was scheduled to die for murdering his mother and father-in-law. Panetti is mentally ill and his case is focused attention on capital punishment and mental illness.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
